channel.title: Abouts on D2D Natural Resources and Data Literacy
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on D2D Natural Resources and Data Literacy

item.title: About
item.description: Program objectives: to improve utility of natural resource industry data for the development impact Structure: joint WB/IFC program led by IFC Funding: $2.5 million over 2 years What do we hope to achieve? Move the needle to enable the various stakeholders to effectively re-use NR data for purposes that are relevant to them
